headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Declasse Tornado Rat Rod
content: The Rat Rod comes to town this week, which means you’ll be able to hear only two things on the streets of Los Santos: first, the lung-puncturing roar of an open-air engine; and second, the indignant howls of every environmentally conscious civilian within four square miles. With a soundtrack like this, you’ll never want to turn it off.
